name: Everbilt Heater Insulation Blanket
description: Everbilt Water Heater Blanket helps to save energy by making a gas, oil or electric water heater more efficient. This blanket is made of fiberglass backed with foil that enhances the water heater's insulation without adding excess bulk to it. It has an insulation rating of R-6.California residents: see Proposition 65 informationInsulates water heaterMade of fiberglass backed with foilVersatile for gas, oil or electric water heatersSaves energyEasy to install, includes tape strip 3 in. x 94.5 in.
